howto.intro: Every day you'll be given the opening line to a new novel. You get six guesses to figure out what the novel is.
howto.afterGuess: After each guess, if you don't get the novel right, you'll see whether you got the correct author, and whether the target novel was published before or after the novel you guessed.

example.phrase: For example, you might be given the following opening line:
example.guess: If you guessed the novel 'Oliver Twist', you would see the this:
example.explain: It is telling you that, while you didn't get the novel right, you did get the correct author. The up arrow by the year tells you that the novel you're after was published after 'Oliver Twist'
